mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT a.*, b.cat_name cat_name, b.gen_name gen_name FROM PRODUCT a LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY b ON a.category = b.category AND a.GENRE = b.GENRE ORDER BY pno DESC ) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT a.*, b.cat_name cat_name, b.gen_name gen_name FROM PRODUCT a LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY b ON a.category = b.category AND a.GENRE = b.GENRE WHERE pno = #{pno}
SELECT genre FROM category WHERE gen_name = #{genreTemp}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(PNO, title, category, genre, year, country, director, casting, description, price, p_img, p_video) VALUES(PRODUCT_PNO_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{category}, #{genre}, #{year}, #{country}, #{director}, #{casting}, #{description}, #{price}, #{p_img}, #{p_video})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.gen_name gen_name FROM PRODUCT a LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY b ON a.GENRE = b.GENRE WHERE pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (no, id, pno, title, price) VALUES (cart_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{pno}, #{title}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT c.no, c.count, p.pno, m.id, p.title, p.price, p.p_img FROM member m, product p, cart c WHERE m.id = c.id AND c.pno = p.pno AND c.id = #{id} ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment(orderId, id, totalPrice) VALUES(#{orderId}, #{id}, #{totalPrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT orderId, id, totalPrice, p_date FROM payment WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY p_date DESC

SELECT o.orderId, o.id, o.totalPrice, o.p_date, d.detailNo, d.pno, p.title, p.p_img, p.price, p.p_video FROM payment o INNER JOIN paymentDetails d ON o.orderId = d.orderId INNER JOIN product p ON d.pno = p.pno WHERE o.id = #{id} AND o.orderId = #{orderId} AND d.id = #{id}
